chart.title: Token Unlock Schedule
chart.tooltip: This chart shows how your tokens will be released over time according to the vesting schedule.

details.title: Unlock Schedule Details
details.tooltip: This table provides a detailed breakdown of your token's unlock schedule, including exact dates, percentages, and estimated values.

period.title: Period
period.tooltip: The unlock period number, with TGE (Token Generation Event) being the initial unlock.

time.title: Time
time.tooltip: The specific date when tokens will be unlocked. Shows month number if no TGE date was provided.

percentage.title: Percentage
percentage.tooltip: The percentage of your total tokens that will be unlocked during this period.

tokens.title: Tokens
tokens.tooltip: The actual number of tokens that will be unlocked during this period.

value.title: Estimated Value
value.tooltip: The estimated USD value of tokens unlocked in this period, calculated using the base price scenario.

summary.title: Total Unlock Summary
summary.tooltip: A summary of the entire unlock schedule, showing total percentage, tokens, and estimated value.
